ThingDef.label: Bloodchicken egg (unfert.)
ThingDef.description: An unfertilized blood chicken egg. It can be eaten raw, but it's much, much better cooked.

ThingDef.label: bloodchicken egg (fert.)
ThingDef.description: A fertilized blood chicken egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a chick. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.
